data.eml:eml: New species of Austropurcellia, cryptic short-range endemic mite harvestmen (Arachnida, Opiliones, Cyphophthalmi) from Australia's Wet Tropics biodiversity hotspot

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jay, Katya R., Popkin-Hall, Zachary R., Coblens, Michelle J., Oberski, Jill T., Sharma, Prashant P., Boyer, Sarah L. (2016): New species of Austropurcellia, cryptic short-range endemic mite harvestmen (Arachnida, Opiliones, Cyphophthalmi) from Australia's Wet Tropics biodiversity hotspot. ZooKeys 586: 37-93, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.586.6774, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.586.6774
